reviews.review:
the game familiar to most gamers and none gamers. counterstrike (in short ''cs'') is the FPS game I've fallen for over and over again (been playing on and off since 1.6)
As you move up the ranks you discover more and more of the game and the creators thoughts about how CS should be played, to get good. 

The only big downside is the anti-cheat system. Even with prime cheaters pass by their anti-cheat quite often.
overall a great community: but as usual, shitheads can be found anywhere. just try to mute and get rid of toxic players as fast as possible if you are in a random matchmaking.

I enjoy this game every day: and I'll recommend this to any FPS-player or players who are interested in trying out a FPS-game. Very simple in it's looks, but a good looking game!

peace!
this game is really fun and compeitve

плюсы:
1) Огромный выбор скинов 
2) Соревновательный режим 5на5.
минусы:
1) Огромное количество неадекватных игроков. 
2) Отсутствие понимания формирования системы повышения/понижения рангов.
Perfect game to pass the time
s6 dan novaya cıkabilen bordo berelidir

Çocukluktan CS 1.6 ile başladık ve bu oyunu gördük, sonra o da ne her yer hile, uçarak awp ile kafa atan mı dersin, sisin içinden her el deagle ya da ssg ile kafa çeken mi dersin ya da ses vermediğim halde yakalayıp tecavüz eden mi dersin. Her neyse ayrıca büyük bir türk oyuncu kitlesi olmasına rağmen bir türlü Türkiye sunucusu açmadılar orası ayrı konu. Aimim çöp değil Global oyuncu gibi de değil, AimBotz haritasında bile aim kasıyoruz güzel hoş oyunda ping değerinden çöpe gidiyor biraz hile de tatlısı. Reflekslerimize de güvensek çok kurtarmıyor.

Najlepsza gra gram w nią od 6 lat i nie zmienię jej nigdy.

you can learn from your mistakes getting good is ez practice aim maps and you will be alright
No soy un gran amante del genero, y no tengo mucha experiencia con otros shoters, pero este juego es un gran clasico, como olvidar las  horas que pase en el cyber con amigos jugando CS.
Ist noch ein schöner Old-School-Shooter, wo es noch nicht diese albernen Fähigkeiten, wie in anderen aktuelleren Spielen gibt.

This shit game should've been taken down back when it was a Garry's Mod. 1.6 was somehow better despite it coming out two decades ago. Anyone coming to this game in the half decade will be pre-fired straight into overwatch by the sweaty nerds who's keyboards are gunked up by their disgusting, sweaty chip-stained TTV uncut fingernails.
The game is great, as long as you play with people you know. Avoid matchmaking like the plague and go ECL og Faceit instead.
Tis fun when there aren't hackers snooping around :)
Fino el juego igual de pana
Есть одно замечание, но очень важное: слишком много аваперов! Было бы не плохо, если будет сделано ограничение на количество awp в команде. Например, 1 awp в соревновательном режиме и 3 в обычном.
